Reviews.Content: lived five continents travelled extensively including throughout egypt guatemala developing nations hotel disgusting seen hotel filthy dirty sheets table chairs walls curtains table carpet bathroom mold shower sink wall disinclined touch hotel booked hotel 3 weeks left night staff odd mix dismissive rude emphasize rundown dirty building top floor climb quiet walls astonishingly thin hear anytime fire door slams constantly set foot hotel

Reviews.Title: “For $75 in London you can't complain much.”
Reviews.Author: WIKITRAVELPEDIA
Reviews.Content: located short walk 3 tube stations kensington gardens park blue bells hotel centrally located considering paid 75 night included wifi daily breakfast can’t harsh motel hotel relatively comfortable bathroom issues stating offered cable tv outright lie channels remote expectations wasn’t totally disappointed reminded paying 48 pound sterling paid dinner times overall hotel experience acceptable perspective short amount time spend expect phone alarm clock else

Reviews.Title: “I realize you get what you pay for, but...”

Reviews.Content: establishment truly standard hotel college dorm condition am photos brochure rented nice furniture stained broken carpet dirty walls dirty painted coat paint cover stains scuff marks water damage mention holes walls curtains falling windows filthy lights bathroom mirror broken hairdryer tv remote broken half outlets night cold heat control night hot water 4 nights day promised broken hair dryer day am maids remake tea cups trash towels replaced bathroom cleaned shower half door bathroom floor flooded showers bathmat towels mop toilets flushed list goes worst staff completly unconcerned leave else top floor hear subway rumble 5 minutes shook building cant imagine lower floors trying sleep conditions beds surprisingly comfortable considering else location

Reviews.Title: “Nothings Changed Since 2007!”
Reviews.Author: JHusack
Reviews.Content: looks nice outside inside horrible stinky moldy smelling bathroom clean rest disgusting eat breakfast dining filthy toilet upstairs overflowed sightseeing wet carpet towels floor buckets catching drips moved windowless basement smelled worse wet declined third nights refunded night manager refused shouting match left night hotel stay garden weeds trash nasty owners nasty facility

Reviews.Content: arrived hotel feeling tired looking forward lie touring city sent basement poor fiance carry suitcases stairs greeted stain looked smelt outside door windows didnt mins shook tube train nightmare start finish staff rude thats location crap hotel

Reviews.Title: “Probably the worst hotel I have ever stayed in, even as a student.”

Reviews.Content: dirty disgusting filthy uncaring noisy beyond belief tube line underneath train ten minutes pr complete lie beginning boutique hotel foot doesnt own name changing spelling actually renamed blue hell yourself favour stay

Reviews.Content: arriving wasnt ready hours check time store luggage closet nearby pub drinks returned able check 5 pretty clean own restroom fridge tv wifi free avoid charges phone location city center plenty pubs restaurants tube station corner connect london price compared youre looking sleep cheap rate dont care little service pool etc spot

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE.”

Reviews.Title: “Not bad choice for the price”
Reviews.Author: altichick
Reviews.Content: booked laterooms paid 60 gbp twin ensuite inc continental breakfast pros location safe quiet pleasant street 5 mins notting hill gate tube mins walk hyde park mins walk local shops pubs restaurants booked twin surprised basement double single bed bunk bed bathroom clean fridge teacoffee facilities 24 hour reception staff polite breakfast adequate toast cereals fresh juice fruit squash cordial cons basement near underground train line considerable noise vibrations 15 30 min intervals throughout day stop midnight resumed 5am frequency 5 7am im fairly heavy sleeper stayed night sight wasnt major overall price location perfect night stay

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel july 2006 business website running 18th century victorian beautiful building fantastic neighborhood third floor lift clerk helped carry bags upstairs thankfully double bed nearly square inch oh london flown taking train gatwick tube plain exhausted laid bed lying underwear record heat london summer air conditioning tried door apparently didnt lock time doesnt lock stack suitcase carry bag front door bed dismal looks linens secondhand store bathroom light fixture hanging wall poor electrical wire spending 5 days london solo coming scotland holy cow looks dump mortified apparently tube underneath hotel third floor shook crazy sounded top train absolutely priceless fire alarm times night stayed day days management told fire alarm trying fixed breakfast paltry cereal warm juice meager plain sad makes chuckle morning line people included waiting computer looking stay tough wimbledon world cup europe travelers usual england sigh lennox hotelwhich significantly wasnt blue bells hotel tell bright spot blue bells hotel management charge penalty leaving wednesday checking morning booked saturday amazingly accommodating offered help bags left morning checked bit drizzly morning walked smile knowing corner hotel slipped steps fell hard bum laugh fitting finish experience dump happened check review lennox hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good value for a budget hotel, but could be cleaner”

Reviews.Content: nestled beautiful street park surrounded static houses kensington notting hill hotel overall value money top floor elevator bedding clean rest cleaner hotel impression dotted ts crossed little effort stay staff friendly helpful traveled 2 17 kids friendly hotel little amenities children close tube stations portobello street portobello market 15min walk queens hyde park kids
